title: 807 25 "A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 1"Transliteration: "Kanashiki Kettō – Rufi VS Sanji" (Japanese:哀しき決闘　ルフィVSサンジ) Directed by: Takashi ŌtsukaStoryboarded by: Yasunori Koyama Shōji Yonemura October 1, 2017(2017-10-01)[n 5]
transformers_text: 807 25 A Heartbreaking Duel Luffy vs Sanji Part 1 Transliteration Kana shiki Kett Ru fi VS Sanji Japanese VS Directed by Takashi tsuka Story boarded by Ya sun ori Koyama Sh ji Yone mura October 1 2017 2017 10 01 n 5 Sanji has memories of his escape from the Germ a Kingdom meeting Zef f and later joining the Straw Hats as his family heads to the Whole Cake Chateau Luffy and Nami ride King Baum out of the Seducing Woods and they contact Chopper and Carrot who reveal where Sanji is headed as they are pursued by Br l e They manage to hide again but Br l e brings Randolph his crane and the Noble C roc into the mirror world to help her hunt the duo down and Chopper gets the idea to gain control of Br l e's power Back in the real world Luffy and Nami reach Sanji and Luffy reunites with his crew mate However Sanji expels Luffy from the carriage claiming to have accepted his royal heritage and disowning Luffy
